name: Dev-blog
tagline: A blog about my experiences as a novice Ruby on Rails developer
body:
### Welcome to my development blog
I wanted create a site from scratch, as I wanted to get started fast, and didn't have money to pay for development.
First I made a Wordpress-site, and tried to build the features I imagined I needed with different plugins, but it didn't go as planned.

Then I switched to Ruby on Rails ...

### Beginning
I tried different tutorials, but never really got started properly.
Then I randomly stumbled upen Daniel Kehoe's "Learn Rails" when it was still a Kickstarter project and backed it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
